form.label: Capability Detail
form.description: That are defined on this Splunk instance

search.query: | rest splunk_server=local /services/authorization/capabilities | fields capabilities | mvexpand capabilities | rename capabilities AS capability | sort capability

| rest splunk_server=local /services/authorization/capabilities | fields capabilities | mvexpand capabilities | rename capabilities AS capability | lookup splunk_capability_details capability_name AS capability
| `compute_capabilities_to_users` | `compute_capabilities_to_roles` | where capability="$capability$"
| fields capability, capability_description | rename capability_description AS description
| fields users | makemv delim=", " users | mvexpand users | rename users AS user

| rest splunk_server=local /services/authorization/roles | rename title AS role | fields role, capabilities, imported_capabilities, imported_roles | eval all_capabilities=mvappend(capabilities, "", imported_capabilities) | mvexpand all_capabilities | where all_capabilities="$capability$" | eval imported=if(isnotnull(mvfind(imported_capabilities, "^$capability$$")), "yes", "no") | fields + role, imported
